articles.title: Former Manchester City and Italy star Mario Balotelli signs for Italian second-tier side AC Monza - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 30-year-old journeyman, who was without a club after leaving Brescia in the summer following their relegation from Serie A, is joining on a deal until the end of the season.
articles.content:
Former Manchester City and Liverpool striker Mario Balotelli has signed for Serie B side AC Monza, ending his five-month spell without a club.
The 30-year-old journeyman, who was a free agent after … [+2500 chars]

articles.title: World Cup 2022 qualifying draw in full as England and home nations discover fate - Mirror Online
articles.description: England and the home nations discovered their World Cup fate in Zurich this Monday. Gareth Southgate's Three Lions will be hoping to build upon their success from 2018
articles.content:
England have been drawn in World Cup Group I and will take on Poland, Hungary, Albania, Andorra and San Marino in Qatar in 2022.
Wales, meanwhile, are in Group E, Scotland Group F, Republic of Irela… [+1717 chars]
